text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: DAPHNE is a multi-arcade LaserDisc emulator. The emulation code is open-source but the included frontend (DaphneLoader) is proprietary. It is available as a libretro core, currently only for Android. Hypseus Singe is a new fork which includes Singe support.
